question: Which state/UT has launched e-Auction portal to boost trade of Saffron?
explanation:
Jammu and Kashmir government has recently launched an e-Auction portal to promote trading of GI tagged ‘Kashmir Saffron’ across the country.
Using the portal, buyers can have access to quality ‘Kashmir Saffron’ and saffron growers can get optimum returns of their yield. International Kashmir Saffron Trading Centre will be used to provide awareness about the portal.
